title: Mount Pleasant's memorial fountain brings tears
text:
Published By: Des Moines Register - Today 
A crew from Alabama on Oct. 21, 2015, removed a memorial fountain to slain Mount Pleasant Mayor Edd King so that it can be refurbished over ...
